long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your browsing experience with a minimalist, dark-themed interface designed for both style and functionality. This extension offers an optimized search bar and customizable shortcuts, making navigation effortless. Additionally, stay informed with real-time weather updates and a clear time display, all seamlessly integrated into your new tab page. Perfect for users who appreciate a sleek, organized, and visually appealing workspace.
